member.summary: The landscape on which the site is located.

member.summary: The location of the site.

member.summary: The index of the site's data for site variables.

member.name: M:Landis.SpatialModeling.ActiveSite.op_Implicit(Landis.SpatialModeling.ActiveSite)~System.Boolean
member.summary: Converts an active site to a bool.
member.returns: true if the site's location can be converted to true (both row and column are positive) and the landscape is not null.

member.name: M:Landis.SpatialModeling.ActiveSite.op_Implicit(Landis.SpatialModeling.ActiveSite)~Landis.SpatialModeling.Site
member.summary: Converts an active site to a site.

member.name: M:Landis.SpatialModeling.ActiveSite.op_Explicit(Landis.SpatialModeling.Site)~Landis.SpatialModeling.ActiveSite
member.summary: Converts a site to an active site.
member.exception: The site is inactive.

member.name: M:Landis.SpatialModeling.ActiveSite.op_Equality(Landis.SpatialModeling.ActiveSite,Landis.SpatialModeling.ActiveSite)
member.summary: Are two sites the same site?

member.name: M:Landis.SpatialModeling.ActiveSite.op_Inequality(Landis.SpatialModeling.ActiveSite,Landis.SpatialModeling.ActiveSite)
member.summary: Are two sites different?
member.remarks: The sites are different if they are on the same landscape, but their locations are different, or if they are on different landscapes.

member.summary: Gets a neighboring site.

member.summary: Closes the raster, releasing any unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:Landis.SpatialModeling.IRasterFactory
member.summary: A factory that produces rasters by opening raster files for reading and by creating new files for writing.

member.name: M:Landis.SpatialModeling.IRasterFactory.OpenRaster``1(System.String)
member.summary: Opens an existing raster file for reading.
member.param: The path of the raster file.
member.remarks:
The raster file must have the same number of bands as the specified pixel class TPixel. Furthermore, the datatype of each pixel band must support the corresponding band in the raster file without loss of data.
Pixel Band Types of Raster Band Supported ---------- ------------------------------ byte byte sbyte sbyte short short, byte, sbyte ushort ushort, byte int int, short, ushort, byte, sbyte uint uint, ushort, byte float float, short, ushort, byte, sbyte double double, float, int, uint, short, ushort, byte, sbyte
For example, if a pixel band is of type "ushort", then the corresponding band in the raster file must be either "ushort" or "byte".
member.exception: path is an empty string ("").
path is null.
The file cannot be found.
The drive or directory portion of the path is invalid.
The file extension in the path is an unknown raster format.
The driver cannot read rasters with the format specified in the path; it can only write rasters in that format.
An error occurred reading the raster file.

list.item: The number of bands in the pixel class TPixel is different than the number of bands in the raster; or
The data type of a band in the pixel class TPixel is not large enough to hold the data values of the corresponding band in the raster; or
The raster's header is missing, incomplete, or invalid.

member.name: M:Landis.SpatialModeling.IRasterFactory.CreateRaster``1(System.String,Landis.SpatialModeling.Dimensions)
member.summary: Creates a raster file for writing.
member.param: The path of the raster file.
The dimensions of the raster file.
member.exception: path is an empty string ("").
path is null.

The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length. For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
The drive or directory portion of the path is invalid.
Access is denied.
The caller does not have the required permission.
The file extension in the path is an unknown raster format.
The driver cannot write rasters with the format specified in the path; it can only read rasters in that format.
An error occurred when writing header to the raster file.

list.item: The raster format does not support the number of bands in the pixel class TPixel; or
The raster format does not support the data type of a band in the pixel class TPixel.

member.name: T:Landis.SpatialModeling.Location
member.summary: A location of a site on a landscape.
member.remarks: This value type is semantically equivalent to its counterpart in the Grids module of this library. This type is defined in this module as a convenience to developers using this module, so they don't have to reference the Grids module if they are working with site locations.

member.name: T:Landis.SpatialModeling.RasterFormat
member.summary: Information about a particular raster format that a raster factory supports.

member.name: P:Landis.SpatialModeling.RasterFormat.Code
member.summary: A short code identifier for the format.
member.remarks: A GDAL format code. Format codes are listed in the "Code" column in the table at http://gdal.org/formats_list.html. GDAL codes are used even if the raster I/O is not implemented with GDAL.

member.name: P:Landis.SpatialModeling.RasterFormat.Name
member.summary: The format's name.
member.remarks: By convention, GDAL format names are used. These names are shown in the "Long Format Name" column in the table at http://gdal.org/formats_list.html. GDAL names are used even if the raster I/O is not implemented with GDAL.

member.summary: Construct a new instance with information about a raster format.
member.param: The format's code identifier.
The format's name.
Can the raster factory write output rasters in this format?

member.param: The current location.
The number of columns in the grid being traversed.

member.name: T:Landis.SpatialModeling.Site
member.summary: An individual site on a landscape.

member.name: F:Landis.SpatialModeling.Site.InactiveSiteDataIndex
member.summary: The data index assigned to inactive sites.

member.name: M:Landis.SpatialModeling.Site.#ctor(Landis.SpatialModeling.ILandscape,Landis.SpatialModeling.Location,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance for a site on a landscape.
member.param: The landscape where the site is located.
The location of the site.
The index of the site's data for site variables.

member.name: P:Landis.SpatialModeling.Site.Landscape
member.summary: The landscape on which the site is located.

member.name: P:Landis.SpatialModeling.Site.Location
member.summary: The location of the site.

member.name: P:Landis.SpatialModeling.Site.DataIndex
member.summary: The index of the site's data for site variables.

member.name: P:Landis.SpatialModeling.Site.IsActive
member.summary: Is the site active?

member.name: M:Landis.SpatialModeling.Site.op_Implicit(Landis.SpatialModeling.Site)~System.Boolean
member.summary: Converts a site to a bool.
member.returns: true if the site's location can be converted to true (both row and column are positive) and the landscape is not null.

member.name: M:Landis.SpatialModeling.Site.op_Equality(Landis.SpatialModeling.Site,Landis.SpatialModeling.Site)
member.summary: Are two sites the same site?

member.name: M:Landis.SpatialModeling.Site.op_Inequality(Landis.SpatialModeling.Site,Landis.SpatialModeling.Site)
member.summary: Are two sites different?
member.remarks: The sites are different if they are on the same landscape, but their locations are different, or if they are on different landscapes.

member.name: M:Landis.SpatialModeling.Site.GetNeighbor(Landis.SpatialModeling.RelativeLocation)
member.summary: Gets a neighboring site.
member.param: The location of the neighboring site relative to the site.
member.returns: a site that converts to false if the neighbor's location is not a valid location for the site's landscape.

member.name: M:Landis.SpatialModeling.Site.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified object equals the current object.
member.param: The object to compare with the current object.
member.returns: true if the specified object is equal to the current object; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Landis.SpatialModeling.Site.GetHashCode
member.summary: Computes a hash for a site.
member.remarks: A site's hash code is the hash code of its location.

member.name: M:Landis.SpatialModeling.Site.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of a site.
member.returns: The string representation of the site's location: "(row, column)".
